entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 24.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this morning then clearing. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 24. Wind chill minus 29 this morning and minus 36 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023
